attributes.action: Ask the European Union for an extension for the MICCAI deadline
attributes.background: The 22nd International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention paper submission deadline is fastly approaching and computer resources are limited to those who are not focusing on deep learning, more time is needed to fulfill all image processing needs.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.
